lines.text: I get two hours of it every Saturday night at a movie. That's enough for me.
SNAFU. That's what it is. SNAFU.
Uh, General, excuse me, sir... I know it ain't none of my business, but Lt. Mallory's right, sir. He DID sleep outside.
I got it right here in my diary.
Not only saw him, I almost *sat* on him. Well, you see, me and my girlfriend was out there, lookin' at the moon...

[Interrupting]
Are you SURE it was Lt. Mallory?
Oh, yes, sir. I never forget a face - especially when I've sat on it!
Like I always said, nothin' like a wedding to bring two married people together! Huh huh!

[Seeing Jean in a skimpy nightgown]
Holy mackerel!
Is that a special outfit for brushing your teeth?
It happens to be the latest thing in night-ware.
Oh... I suppose it gives you more freedom?
Well, that's what we're fighting for, isn't it?
